93797.応募した記事を キャンセルしますか？\n<color_yellow>\n※入札金:
Cancel the post you've submitted?
<color_yellow>
<%dM_GOLD> Gold will be refunded to the Post
Office, with a <%dL_FEE>% commission fee.
<color_white>
<yesno2><close>

93798.『お知らせ優待券』を使って 応募しています。\n応募した記事を キャンセルすると:
I have applied using a "Notification Coupon". When you cancel the submitted article, the "Notification Coupon" will be returned to the
Post Office. * It may take some time to return the Notification Coupon. Do you want to cancel your
submitted article?

93799.応募を キャンセルしました。\n<color_yellow>\n※優待券の返却に:
Application canceled. <color_yellow>*It may
take some time to return your coupon.
<color_white>
<end>

93800.応募を キャンセルしました。\n<color_yellow>\n※ゴールドの返却:
Submission has been cancelled.
<color_yellow>
It may take some time for your Gold to be
refunded to you.
<color_white><end>

93801.掲載されている記事を 削除します。\n入札したゴールドは 返金されませんが\n本:
Remove your post submission?
Your Gold will not be refunded.
<yesno 2><close>

93802.掲載されている記事を 削除します。\n使用した お知らせ優待券は 返却されません:
I want to delete the article. The Notification
Coupon will not be returned, but do you really
want to delete it?<yesno 2><close>

93804.通信エラーのため 処理に失敗しました。\n時間をおいて もう一度 お試しください:
Processing failed due to a communication
error. Please wait and try again.
<end>

93805.掲載開始日が 応募期限を過ぎているため\n応募できません。\n掲載開始日を 変更:
The application cannot be submitted because
the start date has passed the deadline. Please
change the start date.
<end>

93806.お知らせ広場の 説明です！\n<br>\nお知らせ広場は プレイヤーから絵葉書を:
This is an explanation of the Notification Square! The Notification Square is a bulletin board function that solicits postcards from
players and publishes the submitted postcards as articles in the form of an auction. Every day, 6 postcards will be posted as articles.
If you find an article that interests you, please give it a "Nice!" to support it! Please use it as a place to post your favorite
postcards, introduce your team, and showcase your activities in Astoltia! Please refer to the "Explanation" for more information about
Notification Square.

93808.この記事には すでに「いいね！」済みです。\n同じ記事には １回しか\n「いいね:
You already gave this article a "Nice!". You
can only give a "Nice!" to the same article
once.
<end>

93809.この日は 他のプレイヤーが お知らせ優待券を\n使って応募しているため ご利用で:
This date is not available because other players have applied using Notification Coupon. Please select another date from the
start date or wait for a cancellation.

93810.設定した内容で お知らせ広場に 応募します。\n本当に よろしいですか？\n<y:
I'd like to apply to Notification Square with
your settings. Are you sure?
<yesno2><close>

93811.入力していない項目が あります。\n全ての項目を 入力してください。\n<end:
There are items that have not been entered.
Please enter all items.
<end>

93812.お知らせ広場に 応募しました！\n指定した掲載開始日に\nお知らせ広場を ご確認:
You have applied for Notification Square!
Please check Notification Square on the
specified start date.
<end>

93813.何についての 説明を見ますか？\n<select_se_off>\nお知らせ広場:
Which explanation would you like to read?
<select_se_off>
About Notification Square
About Nice!
How to Apply
Posting Criteria
Cancel a Post
Delete in Process
<select_end><close>

93817.お知らせ広場に\n書いた絵葉書を\n応募します:
View postcards
that you have
written.

93819.設定した内容で お知らせ優待券を使用して\nお知らせ広場に 応募します。\nよろ:
I would like to apply for Notification Square
using Notification Coupon with my settings.
Are you sure?
<yesno2><close>

93820.他のプレイヤーが 先に\nお知らせ優待券を使用して\n応募されたため 応募できま:
The application could not be submitted because
another player submitted an application using
the Notification Coupon first.
<end>

93821.お知らせ広場に 応募したあとでも\n「応募をやめる」を 選択することで\n応募を:
You can cancel your application by selecting "Cancel Application" even after you have applied to Notification Square. However, you
can only cancel postcards submitted up to 4 days prior to the first day of publication. If you cancel your submission, you will be
charged a cancellation fee of <%dL_FEE>% of your bid.

93822.お知らせ広場に 絵葉書が掲載されたあとでも\n「掲載中の絵葉書を削除」を 選択す:
You can remove a postcard from Notification Square even after it has been posted by selecting "Remove Postcard from Notification
Square". Please note that you will not get back the gold you bid or the Notification Coupon you used even if you delete the
postcard after it has been posted on the site. Even if you delete a postcard, you will not be able to apply for the postcard until the date
when the deleted postcard is no longer posted on the site.

93823.お知らせ広場では 掲載されている各絵葉書に\n「いいね！」を することができます:
Notification Square allows you to give a "Nice!" to each of the postcards listed on the site. The creator of the postcard with the
most "Nice!" among the six will receive a "Notification Coupon" from the management team. With the "Notification Coupon", your
postcards will be listed free of charge and with priority, so you may see more of your supporters' postcards listed on the site. If
you like it, please give it a "Nice!"! Let's support the postcards and their creators.

93824.同じ掲載開始日に 応募された\n絵葉書の中で 入札金額が多いものから６枚が\n記:
The first 6 postcards with the highest bids among those submitted on the same date will be published in Notification Square. However, up
to three Notification Coupon applications will be given priority for publication. We will check the contents of your application, so if
your postcard is inappropriate, it will not be posted on the bulletin board. Please use the bulletin board with good manners.

93825.お知らせ広場は プレイヤーから絵葉書を募集し\nオークション形式で 記事として\:
Notification Square is a feature that solicits postcards from players and publishes them as articles in the form of an auction. The same
article can be viewed on any server, on any continent. To enter, you will need a postcard and gold. Six postcards will be published per
day in the order of the highest bids. Each article will be posted for 7 days. Each postcard will be posted for 7 days, and a new
postcard will be posted at the end of each day.

93826.お知らせ広場に 応募するには\n「応募する」を選択して 「タイトル」「絵葉書」\:
To apply for Notification Square, select "Apply" and set the "Title", "Postcard", "Starting Date", and "Bid Amount". You can set
the start date from 5 to 12 days in advance. If your bid is not selected for an article, you will receive a full refund of your "Bid
Amount. Please note that it may take some time for the refund.

93991.応募されている絵葉書は\n掲載日まで キャンセルすることができません。\n応募し:
Please wait for the date of publication of
your postcard application. Please wait for the
publication date of your postcard.
<end>

93992.お知らせ広場に 応募するには\nお金が 足りません。\n<color_yello: You do not have enough money to apply for Notification Square. You need at least <%dM_GOLD_MINIMUM> gold to apply.

posted on the website.
